revised_title: Polygenic Mutation and Variation in Natural Populations
tldr: The article discusses the dynamics of natural populations and the role of polygenic mutation and variation in their evolution. It highlights the importance of balanced combinations of genes and the resistance to change under selection. The author also explores the advantages of heterozygotes in fertility and stability, as well as the effects of polygenic mutation on natural populations.
